about_the_game:
Vivat Slovakia is an open-world game set in the newly independent Slovakia, a country on the dividing line between East and West. As remnants of communism linger, weakened institutions allow corruption to thrive, and power falls into the hands of the highest bidder. Fueled by money and violence, the “wild '90s” era brings a city steeped in intrigue and danger.

Discover the gritty charm of '90s Bratislava, sprawling across a faithfully recreated 10 km² of bustling streets and historical landmarks. Take on the role of an undercover secret police officer disguised as a taxi driver and explore a city that reflects the tumult of an era caught between communism and capitalism, with meticulously transformed real-life businesses, homes, and gathering spots. 

The game’s dynamic, open-world design invites you to dive into a richly detailed environment and witness Slovakia’s capital in all its untamed, Slavic glory.

Navigate the streets in a lineup of over 50 vehicles, each reflecting the distinctive character of early '90s Slovakia. From rugged socialist-era workhorses to luxury imports only the elite could afford.

Whether driving old Czech sedans, classic German imports, or rare gems from the era, you’ll encounter vehicles that capture the economic disparities and stylistic trends of the period. With real-world driving physics and attention to detail, the cars in Vivat Slovakia allow players to connect with an important part of Slovakian history through the sights and sounds of its streets.

Step into a narrative inspired by real events, weaving a tale of loyalty, corruption, and thirst for power. Players will uncover complex relationships and shifting alliances as they work to navigate a world where political agenda and criminal enterprise are often intertwined. 

Every mission is designed to reflect the historical conflicts of the '90s, from the shadowy operations of state security, to underground deals that shaped the nation's path. The game brings this gripping storyline to life with the talents of professional voice actors, enhancing immersion and intensifying the struggle for survival and integrity.

Bratislava in the 90s is a battleground of power, dominated by gangs with strong political ties. Law enforcement is weak, and organized crime often operates during broad daylight and with government protection. Daily life includes bombings, racketeering, and deadly disputes as rival factions carve out their territories.

Vivat Slovakia lets players experience this chaos up close, featuring a range of historically accurate weapons that were commonly seen in the hands of enforcers and criminals alike. The era’s most infamous weapons capture the essence of survival in a system where "You don’t have what you don’t steal."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5–9600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required. Ultrawide screen not fully supported during early access.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700 / AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required. Ultrawide screen not fully supported during early access.

short_description: Vivat Slovakia is an open-world action game set in '90s Slovakia, where corruption runs deep and law enforcement is weak. Uncover a gripping story based on true events as you explore and shoot your way through a city at the crossroads of Eastern Europe’s turbulent history.
